ISSUE.TITLE: Price range filter not working properly
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: nopCommerce 4.60-Beta Steps to reproduce the problem: Step 1: Click on Computer => Notebook subcategory. Step 2: Select minimum price 29 and maximum price 29 in price range slider Step 3: You can see category related all products will be display. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/82799708/206398861-e2395ba9-01b2-4c93-825a-225d6d7c369d.png)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #6444 Trim IP address to search in admin area

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6451 Fixed incorrect price range filter when selected price is the most minimal
